reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Who is Behind Multiple Kidnap Attempts?
reviews.reviewText: Laird Duncan McLennan wants his sister Yvaine to marry because he wants her to be protected. She is resisting, but cannot stop his plan to have a competition to have other clans vie for her hand.Laird Arran MacGregor is a close friend of Duncans, and likes Yvaine, but does not want to marry, due to fears he will become like his father who was not a good leader and a vile man. Arran is the technically the Laird of his clan since his father was killed, but avoids his clan, as he does not want to be the Laird. He has a man he trusts as his second, but his clan is plagued with attacks from Laochra bandits who attack his villages and his people are in despair.Yvaine is kidnapped by the Laochra bandits more than once, but escapes. Her life is in danger, although the bandits are told to kill anyone who tries to protect her, but keep her alive. It seems like a clan leader is behind the bandits, but it is hard to tell who it is and why she is targeted. Suspicion is everywhere as to who it is.The competition starts, and Arran does not like to see Yvaine talking to other clan leaders and does not like to see them pursue her. He does not feel worthy to be her husband, but cannot stand to see the other leaders giving her their attention.Laird Duncan started this competition hoping to push Yvaine and Arran together because everyone close to them and their interactions knows they will be a good match. Both are resisting.It was hard to discern who is trying to cause all the trouble for Arran's clan and for Yvaine. The book held my attention and had a good plot. I gave it 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Game Of Love !
reviews.reviewText: Tempting The Highland Devil Book 3 in the Series : Highland Devils , Eloise Madigan lures us in this Intense Love Story. Friends, Both Loving each other secretly, one forcing to be married to someone else, the other jealous to stubborn to fight for what he truly wants. Danger all around with kidnapping and safety becoming an issue ! Is a love Strong enough To Win Out ?Yvaine MacLennan was the daughter to the Laird .Now with her Father gone her Brother Duncan Laird MacLennan had his mind set that she will marry. So he set up Games ! Let The Best Man Win ! She was the Prize ! Only she wanted to marry for Love ! Her Heart was set one someone else !Arran Laird MacGregor never wanted to be Laird. His Father was cruel and had a terrible reputation. He wanted nothing to do with it. So he traveled and founded a home at the MacLennan Castle.Yvaine and Arran became acquainted when he became Best Friends with her brother Duncan. Both had eyes for each other. Only neither would admit it for different reasons. They would argue, he was over protective, even to the point of jealousy. The games began, the tension builds, danger is around. ! Who Will Win Her Heart ? Can She Get Him To Admit He Loves Her ?This Story goes right to the end with Mystery and Danger ! Love is The Air the Whole Time trying to fight its way out ! You are to Captivated in this Tale !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars swept up in the drama, complications, revelations and...
reviews.reviewText: I was swept up in the drama, complications, revelations and emotion of Yvaine and Arran's story.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars exciting, dramatic and steamy
reviews.reviewText: Another amazing tale from this talented and crafty storyteller! Duncan, Yvaine’s older brother and Arran’s best friend, decided that it was time for Yvaine to marry, something to which she was adamantly opposed. A competition was announced and the invitations went out to all of the elgible lairds, stating that the winner would gain Yvaine’s hand in marriage. It drove Arran crazy to see Yvaine spending time with the other men, and since he had vowed never to marry in order to make sure that his father’s line ended with him, he knew that he would just have to live with his jealousy. Arran’s mixed messages were frustrating Yvaine, who was sure he cared for her if he would only admit it. Fast forward and they are married and living in his castle. Now he has to come to terms with being an active laird, while keeping Yvaine at arm’s length. This story is nonstop action. There are kidnappings, bandits, betrayals, battles, immobilizing potions, celebrations, bedsport and so much move. Arran strives to be a better man than his evil father, and vascillates between anger and fear as he tries to get his emotions under control. This story will spike your blood pressure, tie your stomach in knots and have you smiling from ear to ear. It is exciting, dramatic and oh so steamy! Loved it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoyed this story, actually I have enjoyed each story in this series Duncan, Lilly and now Arran and Yvaine. I love the angst the push and pull between the main characters even quite funny at times, anyway this really is a great read holds your interest from beginning to end along with all the family and friends from the beginning of this series. Again this is a very good read and historical romance lovers like me you won't be disappointed, so don't pass this up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was quite the nailbiter story of friendship growing to love. With Yvaine being kidnapped 3 times & saved by Arran, love was the only possible outcome. It was a mystery trying to determine who kept kidnapping her and why? The story really kept my attention while looking for the happy ending!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This book sounds interesting. She will steal his heart and whole body

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of twists
reviews.reviewText: This story is between two friends who grew up together to realize they belong together. There is a lot of sexual tension until kidnappings make them realize their love. Arran is a strong warrior with many insecurities and Yvaine is a Lady that wants love which Arran doesn’t feel he can give until he can keep her safe but, from who. Suspense keeps you guessing. Good read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What a ride of emotions . The story went from elation to terror and back. But who was the man that was behind the terror? Read it and find out
